Rooms.Name: Path in the plains
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the
strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping
here. The path continues east, north and west leads to plains and you see
the path towards the north gate of midgaard to the south.

Rooms.Name: Path in the plains
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the
strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping
here. The path continues east and west.

Rooms.Name: Path in the plains
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the
strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping
here. The path continues north and west.

Rooms.Name: Path in the plains
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the
strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping
here. The path leads north and south. To the east and the west you have the
grassy plains.

Rooms.Name: Path in the plains
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the
strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping
here. The Path leads north and south.

Rooms.Name: Path in the plains
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the
strong winds blow through your hair as you watch the beautiful landscaping
here. To the east and west you see the grassy plains. The path extends into
small foothills to the north and also continues south.

Rooms.Name: Path in the foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are on the path leading through the small foothills. The wind blow
through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping here. From the
north you sense a certain freshness. The path continues east and south. You
smell freshness from north.

Rooms.Name: Path in the foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a path situated in the small foothills. The winds are
more than average here but it feels nice. You can follow the path east or
west.

Rooms.Name: Path in the foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a narrow path in the foothills. You feel the strong
winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping here.
The path goes north and west.

Rooms.Name: Path in the foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a path situated in foothills. To the west you sense a
certain freshness and the path continues south and east.

Rooms.Name: Path in the foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a long path in the east-west direction. The
surroundings are green, vegetated foothills. You are able to force your way
through some dense plants to the north.

Rooms.Name: Path in the foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on the long, narrow path through the foothills. To your
east you see a T-intersection and to the west the path continues far.

Rooms.Name: The path intersection
Rooms.Description:
You are standing on an intersection between 3 paths. To the west you can
follow a long, narrow path through the foothills. To the north a wide path
leads to the Village of Ofcol and an ancient path leads towards the south.

Rooms.Name: Road to Ofcol
Rooms.Description:
You are walking on a wide road with trail marks on it. To the north you
see the village of Ofcol and to the south there is the T intersection. You
can enter the foothills west. The foothills to your east are too steep to
climb.

Rooms.Name: Outside Ofcol
Rooms.Description:
You are standing outside the village of Ofcol. The village looks very
small, but still a nice and safe place to stay. You may enter the city to
the north or journey towards the T-intersection in the southern direction.

Rooms.Name: Gallow hill
Rooms.Description:
You walk in the grassy plains. On this little hill you can see two
gallows, with rotting human tissue hanging from the ropes. There is a sign
here.

Rooms.Name: Grassy plains
Rooms.Description:
You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind
is strong and rough. Far to the north you can see the foothills and further
on mountain peaks are visible.

Rooms.Name: Grassy plains
Rooms.Description:
You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind
is strong and rough. Far to the north you can see the foothills and further
on mountain peaks are visible. City of Midgaard is to the south but so are
some VERY steep slopes.

Rooms.Name: Grassy plains
Rooms.Description:
You walk in the beautiful grassy plains. The wind is strong and rough.
Far to the north you can see the foothills and further on mountain peaks are
visible.

Rooms.Name: Grassy plains
Rooms.Description:
You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind
is strong and rough. To the north you can see the foothills and just behind
mountain peaks are visible.

Rooms.Name: Grassy plains
Rooms.Description:
You walk in some grassy plains. The wind is strong and rough. To the
north you can see the foothills and further on mountain peaks are visible.

Rooms.Name: Grassy plains
Rooms.Description: You walk in the grassy plains. The wind is fairly strong.

Rooms.Name: Grassy foothills
Rooms.Description:
You walk in the grassy foothills north of the plains. The wind is rough.
To the north you can see foothills and just behind them mountain peaks are
visible.

Rooms.Name: The steep foothills
Rooms.Description:
You walk in the steep foothills. It is rather hard to move here. To the
north you can see a grassy valley with wildflowers.

Rooms.Name: The steep foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are walking in the steep foothills. It is rather hard to move here.
To the north you can see the mountains towering over you. Pine trees grow
here.

Rooms.Name: The steep foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are walking in the steep foothills. It is rather hard to move here.
Further to the north you can see the mountains towering over you. Several
pinetrees grow here.

Rooms.Name: The pool in the foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are standing by a pool in the small foothills. It is clear and cold.
A steep slope rises up into the foothills to the north. Behind them ... The
mountains.

Rooms.Name: The foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are walking in some foothills. It is rather hard to move here.
Further to the north you can see the mountains towering over you. Several
pinetrees grow here.

Rooms.Name: In front of hut in foothills
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in the foothills. To the west, well hidden among the
small foothills and pines, you see a small hut. To the north you can see the
foothills, and some pineforrest. Further on mountain peaks are visible.

Rooms.Name: Hermit's hut
Rooms.Description:
You are inside the hermit's hut. It is rather old, but serves it purpose.
It keeps its habitant from the rough winds and dangerous beasts of the
plains and foothills. There is a small fireplace here.

Rooms.Name: The ancient path
Rooms.Description:
You are moving on an ancient path. The path is slightly covered with
leaves and twitches. To the north you can see the T-crossing and the path
continues south.

Rooms.Name: The ancient path
Rooms.Description:
You are standing on the ancient path which runs north and south. The path
is hardly visible here.

Rooms.Name: The ancient path
Rooms.Description:
You are standing on the ancient path which runs north and south. The path
is hardly visible here.

Rooms.Name: The ancient path
Rooms.Description:
The path runs north and east from here. You notice some markers placed
along the side of the path.

Rooms.Name: The wooden bridge
Rooms.Description:
You have stepped upon a wooden bridge. It looks old but safe to cross. It
is made of a wood you haven't seen before.

Rooms.Name: The ancient path
Rooms.Description:
You find yourself located between the bridge and the rock formations. As
you approach the formations you begin to realize the true size of them,
about 15 feet tall and almost perfect rectangular shape. You feel impressed
with the awesome sight.

Rooms.Name: Grassy plains
Rooms.Description:
You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind
is strong and rough. Far to the north you can see the foothills and further
on mountain peaks are visible.

Rooms.Name: The Stones of G'harne
Rooms.Description:
You are in the center of 7, 15 ft tall monolith like black stones. In the
center of the ring formed by the monolith you can't help noticing a big
sacrifice altar. The ground is covered with dirt, but the altar shows no
sign of such. West of here is the ancient path.

Rooms.Name: Dark smelly tunnels
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a gloomy tunnel leading south and west, right under
the altar of G'harne. The walls are covered with a smelly slime and small
rotting pieces of a meat like substance, fills the air with an unbearable
stench. You might be able to force your way up into fresh air from here.

Rooms.Name: Dead end of tunnel
Rooms.Description:
The tunnel comes to an abrupt end here. It simply looks like it hasn't
been excavated further. North of here the tunnel makes a turn east.

Rooms.Name: Dark smelly tunnels
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a gloomy tunnel leading east and west. The walls are
covered with a smelly slime and small rotting pieces of a meat like
substance, fills the air with an unbearable stench.

Rooms.Name: Dark smelly tunnels
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a small smelly tunnel under the plains. The smell is
growing stronger to the west, so is the density of the slime and other
undeterminable substances ...

Rooms.Name: The Hall of G'harne
Rooms.Description:
You stand in the hall of G'harne. The walls are dressed with strange
carving, symbolizing human sacrifice and people worshipping giant worms.
Disgusting slime and gore are also very dominant in your view of this room.

Rooms.Name: Steep slope
Rooms.Description:
You try to climb down the slope. > You slip! You fall and tumble. You hit
your head HARD. You die. You've fallen, and you can't get up!

Rooms.Name: Open Plains
Rooms.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Rooms.Name: Open Plains
Rooms.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Rooms.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Mobiles.LongDescription: Aruncus the Druid is walking around here, searching for herbs.
Mobiles.Description:
Aruncus is a tall, skinny druid with a face marked by nature. He seems to
be in peace with himself and his surroundings.

Mobiles.LongDescription: Sorbus the Hermit is sitting here, roasting a rabbit.
Mobiles.Description:
Sorbus bares the marks of a long, hard life in solitude. He is dressed in
simple clothing and looks like he has little or nothing to say.

Mobiles.LongDescription: There is a citizen of Ofcol here glaring at you ... Stranger!
Mobiles.Description:
He seems like a nice person with no interest in harming you or others. He
wears normal, light clothing and has an anonymous face.

Mobiles.LongDescription: There is a citizen of Ofcol here glaring at you ... Stranger!
Mobiles.Description:
She seems like a nice person with no interest in harming you or others.
She wears a minimum of clothing and has big ... Eyes.

Mobiles.LongDescription: Shudde-M'ell the Giant worm of G'harne is guarding his treasure.
Mobiles.Description:
Shudde-M'ell is about 15 ft long and is surrounded by an evil stench, The
worm is the protector of the treasure of G'harne and has been so for as long
anyone can remember.

Mobiles.LongDescription: Luxan the Shopkeeper is here, eager to sell you anything.
Mobiles.Description:
Luxan is dressed in a strange jacket. He looks like a mean trader from
the outskirts of Midgaard. His life is seems to be totally occupied with
trading. He looks very fit and capable of protecting his goods.

Mobiles.LongDescription: An Innkeeper is here waiting for your order.
Mobiles.Description:
The Innkeeper looks skilled in brewing different beers and mixing the
wierdest drinks known. He also looks very big.
It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.

Mobiles.LongDescription: Ravan's pet dragon is bouncing around here flapping her cute wings.
Mobiles.Description:
Ravan's pet dragon is about 3 ft. Tall with small pointy teeth. The small
wings are eagerly trying to lift her from the ground, but so far they
haven't succeeded.
